English: We secured the airport, and a reporter\nshowed up on the first flight in.
She embedded herself with us,\njust as we got our orders to roll out.
Her name’s Marian Quandt, and she can’t have\na brain in that pretty head of hers.
She hauls her cameraman right up into the line\nof fire like her microphone deflects bullets.
We’re on our way to the north shore to clear\nthe beach for the arrival of our reinforcements.
For a while, we thought the SLA had run out of steam\nwhen they broke off fighting near the airport.
Seems like they just decided to head us off at the beach.
This place is lousy with them...
